BeeDip open source geological compass ver. 0.2

BeeDip allow to:
 - collect structural geological georeferenced measurement on surfaces and lineations, in customizable project;
 - show the measurement points on maps (also off-line) - import and export Geopackage data, in a dedicated but not exclusive way for QGIS.
